Sentencas: Onset sintering temperature was measured and sintering of NiO-YSZ specimens was carried out at 1450 degrees C for different soaking times.

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ cermet with varying open porosities between 23 and 41% was obtained by the in situ reduction of NiO-YSZ.

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity decreased while thermal expansion coefficient remained essentially the same with increasing porosity.
